snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg, who has an affinity for The Financial Times, is said to be weighing the wisdom of buying the newspaper if it is put up for sale by Pearson.
abstract: New York Mayor Michael R Bloomberg is said to be considering purchasing The Financial Times Group, which would include the prestigious business daily and half interest in The Economist; Bloomberg has expressed personal esteem for publications, but is deterred by stark realities of declining newsprint industry.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and MICHAEL BARBARO

lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg, who has an affinity for The Financial Times, is said to be weighing the wisdom of buying the newspaper if it is put up for sale by Pearson.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Weighs Making a Run for Financial Times
headline.main: Bloomberg Weighs Making Bid for The Financial Times
